TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saturation extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Office2010.Word.PercentageType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2010 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is w14:sat.

remarks.format:
## Remarks *2.5.3 CT_Percentage*
*Target namespace:* http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordml
*Referenced by:* CT_SRgbColor, CT_SchemeColor
A complex type that specifies a percentage in thousandths of a percent. For example, the value of 1 represents 0.001%.
*Attributes:*
*val:* An *ST_Percentage* as specified in [ISO/IEC-29500-4] section 12.1.2.2 and [ISO/IEC-29500-1] section 20.1.10.40 that specifies the value.
The following W3C XML Schema ([XMLSCHEMA1] section 2.1) fragment specifies the contents of this complex type.
*\<xsd:complexType name="CT_Percentage">*
*\<xsd:attribute name="val" type="a:ST_Percentage" use="required"/>*
*\</xsd:complexType>*
See section 5.1 for the full W3C XML Schema ([XMLSCHEMA1] section 2.1).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Saturation class.
